page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA
page.content:
I get up about 6:15 a.m. then I get dressed and have a bowl of cereal after which I get on my bike and go to see my pony.
I have to muck out the stable, put some water in his bucket and fill the hay net. Afterwards I meet my mum about 8:45 a.m..She sees me across the road to school .I come home at 12:00 o'clock to have lunch, we come back to school at five to one do some more work.At school we do Maths,English and Sport.Sometimes we have a ghost-story.
Home from school and back to my pony.I put on his saddle and bridle and I canter,trot and walk until about 8:00 I go home and at 9:00 I go to bed.
